009package imagingbook.pub.regions;
010
011import java.util.List;
012
013
014/**
015 * This interface defines the functionality of region segmenters
016 * that perform contour extraction.
017 * 
018 * @version 2020/04/01
019 * 
020 */
021public interface ContourTracer {
022        
023        /**
024         * Retrieves all inner contours of the associated region labeling.
025         * @return the list of inner contours.
026         */
027        public List<Contour.Inner> getInnerContours();
028        
029        /**
030         * Retrieves all inner contours of the associated region labeling.
031         * @param sort set true to sort contours by (descending) length.
032         * @return the list of inner contours.
033         */
034        public List<Contour.Inner> getInnerContours(boolean sort);
035        
036        /**
037         * Retrieves all outer contours of the associated region labeling.
038         * @return the list of outer contours.
039         */
040        public List<Contour.Outer> getOuterContours();
041        
042        /**
043         * Retrieves all outer contours of the associated region labeling.
044         * @param sort set true to sort contours by (descending) length.
045         * @return the list of outer contours.
046         */
047        public List<Contour.Outer> getOuterContours(boolean sort);
048        
049}
